channel.title: Music – Jessica
channel.description: Recent content in Jessica on Music

item.title: Jessica,김민종 - Love You For All Time
item.description:
When I close my eyes
you’re all that I see
And you’re always
with me in my dreams
We’ll be together
now and forever
Til the end of time
with each passing day
I’m filled
with no doubt
That it’s you whom
I just can’t live
Without
now and forever
We’ll be together
til the end of time
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time-
Everynight I wish
that you’re by my side
And I can’t help
but wish you’d
Hold me tight
always together
Love you forever
til the end of time-
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time
Though for now
you’re far away
My love is
here to stay
Cuz you’re
a part of me-

It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time-
